name: Super Simple and Small 2D Platformer Game
name_original: Super Simple and Small 2D Platformer Game
description:
Controls

You can play with an XBOX 360 controller, the on-screen controls, or the cursor keys on a keyboard.

Materialization of an idea

I've been working on this for almost two weeks. This is my first platformer game where I implemented the basic structure of a 2D platformer.

It's a prototype of an idea. I intend to develop this a whole lot further as I'm quite proud of this game, because it's my first attempt at practicing the creative process, which entails implementing an idea to enumerate more ideas and implementations.

Open source

The source can be found here, which will show you the Typescript of the main game file.

Different versions

The game hosted on itch.io won't really be the latest version, as I host the latest version here on GitHub Pages.
